welcome_message_body: Welcome to Quito, Ecuador! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's historic charm, vibrant culture, and stunning Andean landscapes. Explore and enjoy all that Quito has to offer!

restaurants.name: Vista hermosa 2
restaurants.description: Vista hermosa 2 is a restaurant located in Quito.
restaurants.address: Manuel Samaniego N8-169 y Antepara - afuera del parque itchimbia, Quito

restaurants.name: Las Menestras de la Almagro
restaurants.description: Las Menestras de la Almagro is a latin american restaurant located in Quito.
restaurants.address: Ignacio de Veintimilla (Juan Leon Mera), Quito

restaurants.name: Shibumi
restaurants.description: Shibumi is a asian restaurant located in Quito.
restaurants.address: Ruiz de Castilla n27-103 (Antonio Navarro), Quito

restaurants.name: Laboratorio diseño/gastronomía
restaurants.description: Laboratorio diseño/gastronomía is a sandwich spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: LAMMHAUS GRILL & BAR
restaurants.description: LAMMHAUS GRILL & BAR is a bbq joint located in Quito.
